sources.title: Legend Of Hawes | Full Movie | Western Horror
sources.description:
*Legend Of Hawes* - After a homestead is attacked by ravenous marauders, the lone survivor hires a dangerous gunman to help her track them down and get revenge.
2022.  Stars: Mike Markoff, Emily Whitcomb, Richard Tyson
